documents.document: @coopesdetat @MSF @AmyCorderoy So nice to read some good news! Great article.
@tomlowrey my pleasure! I love taking them so I'm happy for them to be used whenever possible.
Nice write up from @tomlowrey with a couple of my pics. https://t.co/sCfctAhgk3
@davegertler @katshearts also make sure the nominees & winners are prepared to talk to the media & know what to expect. Good luck!
@davegertler @katshearts the one thing I would say is if you want broadcast quality audio from the event make sure you have a splitter box!
.@Birmo "emphatically denies" criticism from former PM Tony Abbott that the major parties are out of touch with voters. @amworldtodaypm
.@Birmo tells @amworldtodaypm there could be an "adjustment process" for schools getting "more than their fair share" of funding.
.@Birmo: I would absolutely expect that the school systems...should use (#phonics) results such as these to inform their funding allocations
.@Birmo on #phonics: It's not the only aspect or attribute required for successful reading & literacy skills but it is a very important one.
The Education Minister @Birmo is coming up on the RN edition of @amworldtodaypm to discuss this with @SabraLane.â€¦ https://t.co/2OpfxrXIZL
@groubes @katshearts @AnnOdong I think they had little air conditioners attached (dongas, basically), but yes.
@katshearts @groubes @AnnOdong Yep, and they've been getting 1100 to 1250 for the past few games.
@groubes @katshearts @AnnOdong I'd be very very surprised if ABC moved the news, so unless the put it on ABC2 it wouldn't be broadcast.
@groubes @katshearts @AnnOdong or the shipping containers at Coopers today.
@groubes @katshearts @AnnOdong Also true (although it's a 4pm kickoff in Perth). Is that a double header too?
@groubes @katshearts @AnnOdong yes, will CCM give up any of their revenue? Just a poor decision all round.
@groubes @katshearts @AnnOdong exactly. And the right to have a stand alone match at their preferred home ground.
@groubes @katshearts @AnnOdong that's better than some I've seen (min $60 in Melb) but it's not ideal & deprives CU of McKellar atmosphere.
@katshearts @groubes @AnnOdong might know prices? This is the main problem with double headers, in my opinion. I hope it's a separate ticket
@brihonyspeed There's so much joy in this.
@groubes @Reidyfour @mccobl @Shagen8 @BrentFordSports @Lee_Gaskin1 that's ridiculous. You finish 1st you should get the extra day's rest.
@katshearts yes I'll be there! Just holler out when you see me.
@katshearts it's certainly been the season for them! I wouldn't rule anything out.
@katshearts I think if it's CU vs Sydney it'll be in Canberra. Sydney would host if they beat Perth and Melbourne City beats Canberra.
@AnnOdong my thoughts exactly. But after 2 head knocks I'm glad they've subbed her, especially in this heat.
Great to see all these goals again! I've got a full album of photos up on my Facebook page: https://t.co/91vYzERsCc https://t.co/s1f68Z7zGn
@jacksongs I use a Canon 5d4 with either a 70-200 or a 100-400 depending on what's available. Then I wifi pics to my phone to tweet!
@jacksongs Thank you! There were 9 accredited photogs there today, which is a relatively high number. Sometimes there's only 3 or 4.
@katshearts thanks Kat, I love the way it does that too!
.@CanberraUnited run away 5-1 winners over @victorywleague. Kinga & @ashsykes91 with a brace each. Grace Maher CU'sâ€¦ https://t.co/tVlep37OPo

.@mrbenjaminlaw @scottspark or if you'd like to join the @amworldtodaypm team at Parliament House you can apply here https://t.co/FRMPc3o7QW
@MelanieTait Amazing. It had sat, unread, on my bookshelf for years, but once I started I got through it in a couple of days.
@MelanieTait Yes, I'll see it eventually, just not right now. I just finished reading 'Behind the Beautiful Forevers' which sounds similar.
@MelanieTait That's why I don't think I can see it. Even though I'd love to know how the story plays out.
@pearpandowdy I'd be interested in an official meteorologist's verdict but I always look for patchy cloud, often on warm days.
@bruspa Thanks Paul!
@AnthonyClarkAU thanks! I've been feeling a bit off the mark photo wise lately so it's nice to get one I'm really proud of.
#Canberra sunsetting its little heart out again. https://t.co/472s7Kamdd
@JessHinchy Loved this story!
@ki_sekiya @abcnews I think that's my challenge. I like the way film forces me to be more deliberate. I am too snap happy with digital!
@PHOTOWALKCanber I just bought a new stock of film to go with my new Canonet. I'm super excited about it!
@pakwayne @abcnews I agree! I've just bought a #Canonet to try to sharpen up my skills.
As someone who just bought (another) film camera, I agree with this 100%! 'Film is not dead': https://t.co/tEzWiT67BE via @ABCNews
@bernyoung @JamieTravers Canberra has a lot going for it, but it does do sunsets particularly well!
Just a fraction of the sunset on show in #Canberra tonight. https://t.co/mu3bkJ6plo
@murpharoo @Meanjin So beautiful.
@PatsKarvelas what does that mean, PK?
Great write up by @_BrittanyCarter of the weekend's @WLeague goalfest with a few photos by me. https://t.co/uOFK9ZdgCY
@WhiteMaurice Good idea, thanks! I knew charity bins were a no go, but hadn't thought of car washes.
@DanielleWarby Thanks. There's been a big focus here recently on only donating things that are good enough to re-use so I wasn't sure.
#Canberra! Do you know of any org. that takes old sheets etc to make into rags? Not good enough to donate but seems a waste to throw out.
@McDonaldSusan @abccanberra welcome back! Sounding flawless, as always.
@coopesdetat @DanielleWarby and I'm about to start Swingtime by Zadie Smith, which Coopes says is excellent.
@coopesdetat Awesome. I have one week of leave left, I plan on doing a lot of reading.
@coopesdetat I've just splurged on the new Zadie Smith, Ali Smith, and Helen Garner's Everywhere I Look. I'll keep you posted.
@coopesdetat @MMarchetta1 Amazing, right? So very, very readable. I raced through it in one day too.
.@abcgrandstand Good thing there were 21 goals across 2 games in the @WLeague to keep everyone entertained!
@hollythrosby @coopesdetat so glad you liked it! I'm contemplating a re-read before I go back to work.
2 goals apiece in the 2nd half sees @CanberraUnited 7-2 winners over @PerthGloryWomen. #CBRvPER https://t.co/vwz0nZzoOy
@collinsadam thank you, I appreciate it!
@collinsadam feel like I'm in the wrong position today but the CU players are giving me plenty of chances to get it right!

FT: @CanberraUnited 2 @AUFCWomen 2. Lots of controversy. More pictures once my camera and phone start talking to each other. #CBRvADL

@TheWomensGame that would have been her second?
@osbornep You beat me to it.
@gcnelson Congratulations! Very well deserved. I can't wait to see which pic you've submitted.
Appointment of new solicitor-general widely welcomed - via @abcnews @amworldtodaypm https://t.co/XUqF6OdCTP https://t.co/OBWQirdYvd
Dr Stephen Donaghue QC is the new Solicitor-General. Here's the release from AG Brandis. @abcnews @amworldtodaypm https://t.co/YyQzIGWM61
@Gay_Alcorn It's aimed at 7-14yr olds. (I was looking for my nephews). @saffronhowden is the editor if you have more questions.
@Gay_Alcorn If you've got some kids to buy for you should check out @crinklingnewsau.
@GrogsGamut @srpeatling @mrseankelly it really is. The obit summed up SH's work well. Beautiful, tragic novels. A good reminder to re-read.
Remember the #backpackertax? How could you forget. @AnnaVidot has this handy explainer on the current state of play. https://t.co/xynMB1Iz8H
@mrseankelly @nytimesarts Counted or not, she was a wonderful writer. Thanks for sharing the obit.
@JodieGunders @abcnews it's something I'd love to see.
@LaTrioli @abcnews I hope not! The story suggests it's genuine.
@A_J_Brewster the story says it wasn't a competition. I think it must have been of moonlight & maybe someone with a spotlight? Great stuff.
